system.description:
Racial Traits

  • High elves receive the extra feat Practiced Stylus for free at 1st level, even if they do not meet the prerequisites.
  • High elves receive the extra feat Runic Stylus (Any) for free at 1st level, even if they do not meet the prerequisites.
  • High elves are herbivores. Consuming food out of this diet causes them to become Sickened for 24 hours.
  • High elves have Eludein as their native language, and can select Sidhe or Haramut as a secondary language.

Racial Traits (Active Effect)

  • High elves are Medium sized creatures.
  • High elves have a Mental Limit equal to ((6+WIS Score)×CL) + 60.
  • High elves receive a −4 Racial Recoil Penalty to recoil when using any weapon that has recoil.
  • High elves have a base Combat Point score of 17.
  • High elves CHP formula is CON Score -1.

Physical Description

A healthy high elf typically stands between 4-5½’, and weighs between 100-170 lbs. The men and women are usually of the same height and facial features, making them difficult to determine at a mere glance. Elves have slightly pointed ears, that they often decorate with jewelry and piercings. High elven skin tone ranges from a pale white to a soft tan, and their hair ranges from white to a light blond, usually in a long straight texture. The average elven lifespan is 160 years, reaching physical adulthood between the ages of 20-27.

Language

The native language of a High elf is Eludein. High elves will usually speak a multitude of languages.

Names

High Elven names are typically one long singular name, that is often shortened for ease of speech with other races. This name is almost always in Eludein.
